title: Journal of Polymer Science

contents.note: Publisher site (full text also available for subscription or payment)

succeeded-by.note: Journal of Polymer Science, Part A: General Papers
Journal of Polymer Science, Part B: Polymer Letters
Journal of Polymer Science, Part C: Polymer Symposia

additional-notes: The first issue was titled 'Journal of Polymer Research'. 'Journal of Polymer Science' was used for the second and later issues.
This journal split into multiple parts in 1963, which were reorganized multiple times thereafter.  In 2020 the remaining parts were recombined under the general 'Journal of Polymer Science' title.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
